Package org.uma.jmetal.algorithm.multiobjective.moead

Class AbstractMOEAD<S extends Solution<?>>

java.lang.Object
org.uma.jmetal.algorithm.multiobjective.moead.AbstractMOEAD<S>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, Algorithm<java.util.List<S>>, DescribedEntity
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConstraintMOEAD, MOEAD, MOEADD, MOEADDRA, MOEADIEpsilon, MOEADSTM
public abstract class AbstractMOEAD<S extends Solution<?>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Algorithm<java.util.List<S>>
Abstract class for implementing versions of the MOEA/D algorithm.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Antonio J. Nebro
See Also:
